meanings.definition: The quality or state of being trendy.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit's trendiness caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The trendiness of skinny jeans is popular among teenagers.
meanings.sent3: The cat's trendiness in wearing sunglasses made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The trendiness of the new dance move spread like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The trendiness of the hairstyle made it a hit at the party.

meanings.sent1: The store's window display showcased the latest trendiness.
meanings.sent2: Fashion designers always keep an eye on trendiness to create new collections.
meanings.sent3: The trendiness of wearing socks with sandals is questionable.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork captured the trendiness of urban street art.
meanings.sent5: The trendiness of the new phone model attracted many buyers.
